user_data_unavailable: User data is not available. Ensure user is logged in.

step1.first_hubcoins: Your first 10 Hubcoins are waiting for you!

step3.heading: Let’s tailor our surveys for you
step3.paragraph: Tell us more about yourself so we know who you are, understand your perspective better and bring you relevant surveys.

step4.heading: Why do we ask these questions?
step4.paragraph1: This is so we can bring you relevant surveys. It means students won’t be asked what it’s like being a teacher or someone in Stockholm isn’t asked about public transport in New York.
step4.paragraph2: Bear in mind, we can only find you surveys once you have answered these questions. And you will also get 30 HUBCOINS.
